content.html: Dear non-men who write code: I'm reading resumes from men who have less than 3 months of software experience applying for management and staff-level jobs. Apply. Just go apply. You wouldn't believe what the other folks are getting away with
content.value:
Dear non-men who write code: I'm reading resumes from men who have less than 3 months of software experience applying for management and staff-level  jobs.

Apply.
Just go apply.
You wouldn't believe what the other folks are getting away with
